about_the_game:
Welcome To Extinction

After the failure of project 1306, you as the sole survivor must fight against the mutant insects before they can reach earth.

Dash In And Out of Danger

Another part of your fighting style is how to use your dash. One of our most pivotal mechanics is our dash, moving in and out of fights at speeds whith some invincibility.

Fight With Your Own Style

With multiple guns to chose from you can have your own way of fighting. Be it the standard pistol, maybe picking up a second one, blowing through insects brains with a shotgun, or witling their health down with a SMG. Even some special harder to get ones like a rocket launcher or a sniper rifle. Many ways to cut through their numbers.

Upgrade And Improve

Through out the lab you will find some upgrades to your stats and equipment. These are important, needed to fight off the harder and harder bugs as you fight deeper into the lab.

Fight Bigger and Bigger Creatures

Speaking of going deeper, further in the insects get harder to fight, and some bigger and stronger bugs come out to end your expedition. You can even run into colony leaders, the biggest and baddest of a species, whipping them out may lead to their extinction

Explore Deeper Into The Lab

name: Extinction 1306

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Celeron ‎2.6 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 600

short_description: Extinction 1306 is a top-down roguelike shooter. You are the sole survivor after a failed experiment. You must fight off mutant insects, explore the abandoned lab, level up and find upgrades to improve your skills, and defeat bosses to reach a final threat standing in between you and saving Earth.
